message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'll take a slight majority to start.
I'll take a bit more, considering the inflation hits you harder.
The inflation is hurting both of us, Bob. Let's settle this fairly before it gets worse.
Inflation is indeed hurting, but I can afford to wait a bit longer. You can't.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
